lyrics:
62 contributorsbow down lyricsverse 1 ice cube
the world is mine nigga get back

now the feds trying to throw they book at the crook
but i shook they worm and they hook

running everything west of the mississippi

we got your woman pucker up fore we fuck her up

got 25 niggas running up on yall
for the cheese we want them keys

before any of you guppies get hard

chorus ice cube
bow down when i come to your town
bow down when im westward bound

verse 2 mack 10
i take ten steps and i draw blaow

i bust like a pimple my mind is ill mental

now who wanna fuss so i can buss when i cuss

the westside connec keep it rolling like gold ds
threewheeling and dealing its like the california style
but in the meanwhile in my town you got to bow
you might also likechorus mack 10
bow down when you come to my town
bow down when im westward bound
bow down because i aint a hater like you

verse 3 wc
well its that chuckwearing still sporting the beanie

as i slide my locs on let my khakis hang

fuck hiding it im gangrelated simple and plain
which means i could give a fuck
about you niggas in this rap game ugh
flashy niggas get stuck up ugh beat the fuck up ugh
when you come around keep your chain tucked from this
zerozeroapostrophe s shit
fuck a studio lyricist im real with this yes
talk the talk walk the walk
diss me on wax
im trying to saw your whole fucking head off nigga
im platinum bound so bitch shut up
and nigga all yall could kiss my converse like sho nuff

bow down when i come to your town

bow down cuz i aint a hater like you

ha
